name: GetInChat Live Chat
author: GetInChat

sections.description:
GetInChat enables live chat conversation between you and visitors of your site. Impress customers and increase their loyalty, before they leave your site.

Kick-Ass Features

  • Easy installation: It takes about 30 seconds to install the chat and start interacting with your visitors.

Questions? Just reach out to us through our live chat at www.GetInChat.com or send an email to support@getinchat.com.
sections.installation:
• Install and activate the WordPress Plugin
  • After installation, click the GetInChat section in the left toolbar
  • Create a new GetInChat account, or use your existing one
  • Sign in into agent client to start.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Added support for channels
  • Fixed languages support

1.0.2

  • Fixes to improve installation process!

1.0.1

  • Fixes to improve compatibility with latest WP!

1.0

  • Welcome our brand new version of the plugin!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  • Install and activate the WordPress Plugin
  • After installation, click the GetInChat section in the left toolbar
  • Create a new GetInChat account, or use your existing one
  • Sign in into agent client to start.
